content:
Baalyatthil thaane-ttudayon nin
Smrthi valuthaakki-mariyam nee dhanya
Devaagaare meshayil vacho-
Rappatthaal nee-pariposhithayaayi.
/tninne vaidika-maalaakhamaar maanichu
Nivasichu Daivam ninnil.

Koottam koottam mashihaa bhakthanmaa-
Raam sahader-vidhigeham pooki
Vaallaalavare-himsichappoll
Ghaathakarude-mel raktham paanyozhuki
/tnaathhan kshamaka-ndaniyichaanavare makudam
Thal praarththhana nammallkkabhayam.

Naathhan nammall-kkuththhaanatthe prathi
Nallaashayu-mulldhairyavumeki
Vaangippoyor-naadam kellkkum
Shishdanmaar nava-jeevan nedaanum
/tdushdanmaar vidhi-yetteedaanumuyartthidume-
Nnevam kalppichaanudayon.
